description: This file contains a test case class for building the 'assimp' project using CMake within a build system. It includes setup verification for necessary packages, fetching the project source archive, configuring, building, and installing the project, along with checks for the build artifacts.

classes.name: BuildAssimp
classes.description: A unittest test case class that automates fetching, building, and verifying the 'assimp' library using CMake.

methods.name: setUp(self)
methods.description: Prepares the test by checking for required host packages (cmake or native cmake). Skips the test if prerequisites are missing.

methods.name: test_assimp(self)
methods.description: Performs the process of downloading the source, configuring CMake, building, installing, and verifying the resulting shared library exists.
